summary: This is an email chain from November 2021 regarding the upcoming Finest Foundation Awards ceremony on November 9, 2021. The emails congratulate two investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force for their work on the Epstein case, indicating they are award recipients. The document shows internal recognition of law enforcement efforts years after the main investigations.

persons.name: Det
persons.context: A detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force who is one of the recipients of the Finest Foundation Award for work on the Epstein case.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: A detective mentioned as a contact for RSVPs to the Finest Foundation Awards ceremony.

connections.description: Both are investigators on the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force who worked on the Epstein case and are being jointly recognized with an award.

events.title: Finest Foundation Awards Ceremony
events.description: An awards ceremony held at 1 PP Auditorium where investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force are recognized for their work, specifically on the Epstein case.

keyFacts: In November 2021, investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force were recognized with the Finest Foundation Award for their work on the Epstein case.
The award ceremony was scheduled for November 9, 2021, at the 1 PP Auditorium.
The email chain shows ongoing institutional recognition of law enforcement efforts related to the Epstein investigation years after the main events.
The document references the collaborative NYPD/FBI task force focused on child exploitation and human trafficking.
